Reviews.Title: great deal!
Reviews.Author: pimponce
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife. She absolutely loves it. After a lot of reviewing before purchasing, I decided that the canon t3 was the perfect camera for her.  With everything included, this is really a great deal for someone just starting in the slr range of cameras. The camera itself is top notch. In this price range it is in my opinion the best. Very simple to use on auto, or you can get as complicated as you want with all the different settings. Everything arrived neatly packaged and in perfect condition. I was shocked to see it setting at my house in three days after ordering. So i highly recommend this purchase along with this seller!

Reviews.Title: canon eos t3 camera
Reviews.Author: bacadk2293
Reviews.Content: My husband was pleasantly surprised Christmas morning when he opened the boxes containing his Canon EOS T3 and all the accessories it came with. He thought digital cameras couldn't be as good as his old 35mm film camera. He's a believer now.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Melton
Reviews.Content: I would Reccomend this product to anyone!!!!!! My neighbor purchased just the camera for almost the same price that I purchased this for, the only difference is, is that he purchased his at a large retailer. When I showed him everything that I got with mine he got a little upset.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Cabezas
Reviews.Content: It is what I was looking for; the lens are very good; actually I need more practice with the camera; but any way to to take pictures for fun it look fantastic!If you need some information about trips to Ecuador & Galapagos; Amazon rain forest; bird watching let me know; That is why I bought this camera; because of this trips I do.[...] sale1@terrandesecuador.com or follow us in facebook as: Terrandes Adventure Ecuador.Gustavo Cabezas

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cecelia
Reviews.Content: This truly was a great deal, I'm an amateur in photography. The information provided on the screen is very helpful. Camera software was a real bonus for editing my photos. Both lenses that came with the package are great, but I really love the 75-300!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Emilliana W Lobera
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted a camera like this, and with this bundle, it was well worth it!  there was only one lens(not a canon lens), that came apart when i first opened and tried it on the camera.  i put it back together, and it works fine.  those smaller lens are a little cheap, but they do work.  For the price, this bundle has it all.  I'm not a professional photographer, but with all the tips that come with it in the manuals, I could definitely pull off some great pics like a pro.  Everything works great!
